committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish the Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration to guarantee municipal bonds, and to provide that the interest on certain government obligations shall be taxable income.
short_title: Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration Act

summary.text: Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration Act - Title I: Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration - Creates a Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration to guarantee municipal bonds. Sets forth procedures that a municipality must follow to obtain such a guarantee. Establishes within the Treasury a Municipal Bond Guarantee Fund for use in guaranteeing bonds under this Act. Allows moneys in such Fund to be invested in obligations of, or guaranteed by, the United States. Title II: Amendment to Internal Revenue Code of 1954 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to designate as taxable income interest on specified government obligations.

titles.title: Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration Act
A bill to establish the Federal Municipal Bond Guarantee Administration to guarantee municipal bonds, and to provide that the interest on certain government obligations shall be taxable income.
